title: Tech Trader: The Outlook for Tech Stocks
description: Eric Savitz, associate editor for technology at Barron's and Dan Niles, founder and portfolio manager of Satori Fund discuss the outlook for tech stocks.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Eric Savitz, associate editor for technology at Barron's and Dan Niles, founder and portfolio manager of Satori Fund discuss the outlook for tech stocks.
